Title: Back to School
Writer: Rodney Dangerfield (story), Greg Fields (story), Dennis Snee (story), Steven Kampmann (screenplay), William Porter (screenplay), Pj Torokvei (screenplay), Harold Ramis (screenplay)
Actors: Rodney Dangerfield, Sally Kellerman, Burt Young, Keith Gordon
Plot: To help his discouraged son get through college, a funloving and obnoxious rich businessman decides to enter the school as a student himself.
